bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with qiang zhong 強中 , powerful center. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bu gu zhi 補骨脂 quotes Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 : 玉莖長硬不痿，精出捏之則脆癢如刺針，名腎漏 , “The jade stalk (i.e. the penis) is hard and fails to shrink for a long time. When pinched while seminal fluid is discharged then there is a feeling of brittleness and itching as if being pierced with a needle. This is called ‘ kidney leakage ’”.
